titleStmt.title: TEI schema for the CLiGS group
titleStmt.author: Christof Schöch, José Calvo, Ulrike Henny-Krahmer

publicationStmt.p: for use by whoever wants it

body.p: TEI schema for text collections by the CLiGS group (http://cligs.hypotheses.org).

attDef.desc: Indicates the importance (or significance) of the term value, when alternative values for the same type of term are present.
